thread.title: Tourism dries up in Cape Town's water crisis

title: Tourism dries up in Cape Town's water crisis
text:
Tourism dries up in Cape Town's water crisis Saturday, February 03, 2018 - 01:41 
As Cape Town's residents are forced into stricter measures to preserve water, with taps predicted to run dry in April, there are fears that the flow of tourists - a vital part of the city's economy - could also dry up.   
As Cape Town's residents are forced into stricter measures to preserve water, with taps predicted to run dry in April, there are fears that the flow of tourists - a vital part of the city's economy - could also dry up.  //reut.rs/2DY19VD
